brainly_data.question: Which sentence from the passage is the best example of a feature found in a myth? Near the beginning of life on Earth, Shen Nong, who was the Lord of the Wind, made many journeys over our world. Shen Nong was the second of the Three Sovereigns. The other two Chinese sovereigns were called Fu Xi and Yen Ti. One after another, they helped create civilization and imparted to mankind many skills, lessons, and gifts.
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.text: The answer, I believe, would be the first one because it has something to do with life and fantasy, and that is usually what myths are based off of.
